PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ElectricGeneratorTypeCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Defines a particular type of engine that is a machine for converting mechanical energy into electrical energy.

PropertyDef.Name: ElectricGeneratorEfficiency
PropertyDef.Definition: The ratio of output capacity to intake capacity.

PropertyDef.Name: StartCurrentFactor
PropertyDef.Definition: IEC. Start current factor defines how large the peek starting current will become on the engine. StartCurrentFactor is multiplied to NominalCurrent and we get the start current.

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumPowerOutput
PropertyDef.Definition: The maximum output power rating of the engine.
